arts.ttl: Sheffield United 2-1 Portsmouth: Super Subs Win it For Blades in Subpar Display
arts.sum: Sheffield United returned to winning ways at Bramall Lane with a hard-fought victory over Portsmouth. Despite an unconvincing display, the Blades edged past their struggling opponents to reclaim second spot in the Championship’s automatic promotion places. The Blades took the lead in the 24th minute when Ben Brereton Diaz set up Gustavo Hamer, who drove […] The post Sheffield United 2-1 Portsmouth: Super Subs Win it For Blades in Subpar Display appeared first on Sheff United Way.

arts.ttl: 'Absolutely ridiculous' - Portsmouth boss slams tackle on Callum Lang - before singling out ref for letting Sheffield United away with it throughout game
arts.sum: John Mousinho believes Callum Lang could have broken his leg after being hacked down by Sheffield United substitute Sydie Peck in the dying minutes on Saturday’s defeat at Bramall Lane.

arts.ttl: 'That's a painful one. Should have won. So wasteful' - Portsmouth fans react to defeat against Sheffield United
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been reacting to the Blues’ 2-1 defeat against Sheffield United at Bramall Lane.

arts.ttl: Gutted Portsmouth boss' disbelief after 'performance of season' ends in agonising Sheffield United defeat
arts.sum: Gutted John Mousinho reflected on a harsh Bramall Lane defeat and insisted: That was one of our best performances this season.

arts.ttl: What was said in Portsmouth dressing room after suffering Sheffield United heartache
arts.sum: Josh Murphy revealed his dressing room message to his Pompey team-mate after they went down to a gut-wrenching Sheffield United reverse.

arts.ttl: Sheff Utd strike lucky after TWO horror Portsmouth misses

arts.ttl: Jesuran Rak-Sakyi snatches Sheffield United victory against Portsmouth
arts.sum: Gustavo Hamer’s opener had been cancelled out by Connor Ogilvie.

arts.ttl: 'Absolutely on fire, How did he miss, Fantastic signing': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings against Sheffield United
arts.sum: Pompey slipped to an agonising defeat at Sheffield United when they could well have been toasting victory.

arts.ttl: Impressive Portsmouth suffer more Sheffield United pain as they pay for missed chances
arts.sum: Pompey were left to rue a stack of missed chances as their Bramall Lane pain continued.

arts.ttl: 'Right decision. Was never gonna rotate’ - Portsmouth fans in agreement as starting XI to face Sheffield United announced
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been reacting to John Mousinho’s starting XI and bench for today’s game at Sheffield United.
